text.more:
This network traces the connections of a QAnon-centric Telegram network beggining with three channels, the primary nodes: Attila Hildman, Eva Hermann and Qlobal Change.

Connections are tracked through the forwarding of messages from other channels/groups into the original nodes. The number of forwards from other channels were tallied, and the top-5-most-forwarded channels were included as the secondary nodes.

The process was repeated to create a list of tertiary nodes. The forwards from other channels/groups into the tertiary nodes were tallied and included as edges as well.
text.intro: A look at the German-speaking QAnon network on Telegram
text.title: German QAnon Telegram
